Lab.Description: In this lab you will wire up a settings screen for Contoso Cookbook. You will save and restore roaming settings and seamlessly integrate with the Operating system’s settings charm.
Lab.Title: Settings and Preferences

Property.Name: LongDescription
Property.Value: In this lab you will wire up a settings screen for Contoso Cookbook. You will save and restore roaming settings and seamlessly integrate with the Operating system’s settings charm.
